dmca.title: Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc.
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. Gilmore: 

	As you are aware, this firm is general counsel to Rolex Watch U.S.A., Inc. ("Rolex").  

It has again come to Rolex's attention that the posting for counterfeit Rolex watches remains on your www.freeswan.org Bulletin Board (http://lists.freeswan.org/pipermail/design/2003-March/004535.html).  As indicated in our October 7, 2004 letter, the offer for sale of counterfeit goods is a violation of federal law.  As a result, we are writing to reiterate our demands and again request that you delete the aforementioned posting.

	Since our prior letter serves as notice of the existence of this posting, your continued allowance of this posting on your Bulletin Board may constitute willful contributory trademark counterfeiting and infringement.  

	Therefore, in order to avoid further legal proceedings, we must receive your written response by December 14, 2004 that you have removed the http://lists.freeswan.org/pipermail/design/2003-March/004535.html posting from www.freeswan.org.

	We thank you for your cooperation and prompt attention to this matter.

							Sincerely,

							Gibney, Anthony & Flaherty, LLP


							By: ________________________
								[Private]
